Title: Stegadon
Legend: A charging Stegadon is nothing less than a living battering ram. Its skink riders wield all manner of deadly weapons, while the crushing bulk and sharpened horns of the Stegadon can smash aside even the most determined defenders.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single. Battleline in a Thunder Lizard army

Intro: A Stegadon is armed with Massive Horns, Grinding Jaws and Crushing Stomps.

Rules.Name: Crew
Rules.Rule: CREW: This unit has a skink crew armed with Meteoric Javelins and 1 of the following weapon options: Skystreak Bow; or Sunfire Throwers.

Rules.Name: Armoured Crest
Rules.Fluff: A Stegadon will turn to face a foe head on if it can, so that its thickly scaled crest can protect it from harm.
Rules.Rule: At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit that has up to 5 models. If you do so, until the end of that phase, add 1 to save rolls for attacks made by that unit that target this unit.

Rules.Name: Skink Warparty
Rules.Fluff: Riding atop their imposing mount, skink warparties claim positions of vital importance in furtherance of the Grand Plan.
Rules.Rule: This unit counts as 10 models for the purposes of contesting objectives.

Rules.Name: Steadfast Majesty
Rules.Fluff: Stegadons are near fearless beasts, and their stubborn refusal to back down when faced by even the most terrifying foes inspires great courage in nearby skinks.
Rules.Rule: Add 3 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly SKINK units that do not have the STEGADON keyword while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly units with this ability.

Rules.Name: Sunfire Throwers
Rules.Fluff: These celestial weapons unleash great roiling clouds of cosmic flame.
Rules.Rule: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with Sunfire Throwers. Instead, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit that are within range of the attack. For each 5+, the target unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Rules.Name: Unstoppable Stampede
Rules.Fluff: Stegadons are nigh unstoppable as they crash through the midst of battle.
Rules.Rule: After this unit finishes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
